# Hurtling Stone (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Creation Spells|creation]])

**Level:** [[4th Level Druid Spells|Druid 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** 60 ft.

**Area:** 60-ft. line

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Reflex negates

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Heroes of Battle (WotC), pg. 127

This spell creates a 50-pound stone that speeds away from the caster in a straight line, dealing 6d6 points of damage to each creature in its path. In addition, any Medium or smaller creatures in its path are knocked prone.
